expert-shield-tech-officer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
expert-shield-tech-officer.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
expert-shield-tech-officer.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
expert-shield-tech-officer.name: Expert Shield Tech
expert-shield-tech-officer.ability: While defending, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, when you spend a :redirect: defense token, you may reduce the total damage from the attack by 1 instead of resolving that token's effect.
